personalInfo.name: Akhlas Ahmed
personalInfo.title: Flutter Developer
personalInfo.shortBio: A passionate Flutter developer building high-performance cross-platform apps with elegant UI and clean architecture.
personalInfo.detailedBio: I’m a results-driven Flutter developer with expertise in crafting seamless, high-quality applications for Android, iOS, and Web. My focus lies in writing clean, scalable code and delivering pixel-perfect user interfaces that provide outstanding performance. I have hands-on experience with advanced Flutter state management (Bloc, Provider, Riverpod), Firebase integration, API consumption, and CI/CD automation. I thrive in agile teams, constantly exploring new technologies to create impactful user experiences and efficient digital products.

services.title: Cross-Platform App Development
services.description: Building robust, beautiful apps for Android, iOS, and Web using Flutter and Dart.

services.title: UI Implementation
services.description: Transforming design mockups into pixel-perfect responsive Flutter UIs.

services.title: API Integration
services.description: Integrating REST and GraphQL APIs with secure, efficient data handling.

services.title: App Optimization
services.description: Improving app performance, reducing load time, and optimizing animations.

about.headline: Flutter Developer | Mobile App Engineer
about.description: I’m a Flutter developer focused on creating seamless, performant, and visually appealing mobile applications. My expertise covers state management (Bloc, Provider, Riverpod), Firebase integration, and clean architecture principles. I’m passionate about solving complex problems with elegant, scalable code.

projects.title: Foodie Hub
projects.description: A complete food delivery app built with Flutter & Firebase featuring live order tracking and Stripe payments.

projects.title: Taskly Pro
projects.description: A productivity app with offline sync, calendar view, and custom notifications using local database and Bloc.
